name: Amazoness
author: fufufu420
notes:
5-0 25 min run from L3 to KoG on the treadmill at the gym. Qt3.14 started to use the one besides me midway through game 2 because she knew a real King of Games was climbing with his THICC amazoness. Needless to say I banished that THOT. 

SRH great for mirror, ran that instead of 2 chalice because I wasn't facing many sylvans. Meme extra deck on the 0% chance of spy c spy. Shits on CA and heroes ofc.
